componentDescription: A user interface component for navigating through a sequence of pages.

currentPage.description: Specifies the currently active page number.

totalPages.description: Indicates the total number of available pages.

onPageChange.description: Callback function invoked when the current page changes.

pageSize.description: Optional property to set the number of items displayed per page.

pageSizeOptions.description: Optional array defining the available page size options for the selector.

onPageSizeChange.description: Optional callback function invoked when the page size changes.

showPageSizeSelector.description: Optional flag to control the visibility of the page size selection dropdown.

showPageInfo.description: Optional flag to control the visibility of information about the current page and total pages.

maxPageButtons.description: Optional property limiting the maximum number of visible page buttons displayed at once.

showFirstLastButtons.description: Optional flag to control the visibility of buttons for navigating to the first and last pages.

size.description: Optional property to define the size of the pagination component (e.g., small, medium, large).

variant.description: Optional property to define the visual variant of the pagination component.

shape.description: Optional property to define the shape of the pagination buttons.

views.description: Optional property for applying custom styles to different parts of the pagination component.
